title: Roasted Beet Salad With Ricotta Salata And Pistachios
summary: Roasted Beet Salad With Ricotta Salatan And Pistachios is a gluten free, primal, and vegetarian side dish. For $3.2 per serving, this recipe covers 19% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe makes 2 servings with 359 calories, 15g of protein, and 21g of fat each. 26 people were impressed by this recipe. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes about 45 minutes. If you have beets, ricotta salata, olive oil, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 85%. This score is awesome. Try Beet Risotto With Roasted Asparagus And Ricotta Salata, Beet Salad with Ricotta Salatan and Olives, and Chioggia Beet Salad with Ricotta Salatan and Hazelnuts for similar recipes.
